short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Timekeeper is a browser extension that automatically closes inactive tabs, keeping your browsing experience clean and organized.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience a cleaner, more efficient browsing with 'Auto Close Tab'. This browser extension automatically closes inactive tabs, reducing clutter and enhancing focus. Boost your productivity by keeping only the essential tabs open. Ideal for those who want to improve their digital workspace. Make your browsing simpler, better with Auto Close Tab.
